div.p:
The MSS College of Arts and Science is an institution for higher learning in Wayanad that started functioning in 2022. Currently, the college is undergoing construction and is operating from a temporary building.
The college offers five undergraduate programs, namely BA English, BA Economics, B Com, BBA, and BSc (Psychology). It is affiliated with Kannur University. The college is situated on 6 acres of land at Vellamunda Panchayat in North Wayanad. While the permanent campus is under construction, students can enjoy the scenic beauty of Wayanad, along with its salubrious climate and serene ambiance, providing them with an ideal atmosphere to pursue their studies.
